The folowing are the list of actions that can be performed on this section

  • View all students in a class offering a particular subject for a term, in a specified academic session.
  • View all subjects that have been registered for a particular year in a specified academic session
  • Manage students offering a particular subject. This includes removing a student from offering the subject. It should be noted however, that this particular action is irrevocable.
  • Preview and generate broadsheet in PDF format for a particular subject and for a given class in a specified academic term and session.

In other to facilitate the ease of storage of academic broadsheet, browse and select an folder.

The folder can be selected by clicking on the browse button below, and the path of the folder will be displayed next right to the button. If there be any reason whatsoever to change the folder, click on the browse button again for a new folder selection action.
